name: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
summary:
据Variety爆料指，Disney自家在线频道继《洛基 Loki》及《绯红女巫 Scarlet Witch》后，找了Malcolm Spellman负责为限定剧《猎鹰与冬兵 Falcon and Winter Soldier》执笔，剧中会 由Anthony Mackie及Sebastian Stan继续饰演猎鹰及冬兵。 
　　过去报导指Disney自家在线频道将制作Tom Hiddleston主演的《洛基》及Elizabeth Olsen主演的《绯红女巫》6-8集迷你剧，用来探讨没个人独立电影的角色，两部剧皆由Kevin Feige监督。
info:
• 中文名: 猎鹰与冬兵
  • 原作: Marvel Entertainment, LLC
  • 集数: 6
  • 开始: 2021年3月19日
  • 类型: 科幻
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 每集长: 60分钟
  • 电视网: Disney+
  • 首播国家: 美国
  • imdb_id: tt9208876
  • 编剧: Malcolm Spellman
  • 主演: Anthony Mackie、Sebastian Stan、Daniel Brühl

eps.name: New World Order
eps.desc: Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes realize that their futures are anything but normal.

eps.name: The Star Spangled Man
eps.desc: John Walker is named Captain America, and Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes team up against the rebel group, the Flag Smashers.

eps.name: Power Broker
eps.desc: Sam and Bucky go to a criminal safe haven to find information about the Super Soldier serum.

eps.name: The Whole World is Watching
eps.desc: John Walker loses patience with Sam and Bucky as they learn more about Karli Morgenthau.

eps.name: Truth
eps.desc: Sam Wilson, Bucky Barnes, Baron Zemo, John Walker, and Karli Morgenthau must all deal with the fall out from their actions.

eps.name: One World, One People
eps.desc: Sam Wilson aka The Falcon and Bucky Barnes aka The Winter Soldier team up on a global adventure.
